WorkItem.Description:
Currently missing Don Rodrigo's Fabulous Necklace (BoE world drop) from the list of neck items (item id 67137). Has similar stats to the Necklace of Strife (although weighted more towards mastery) so this isnt particularly urgent.
Â 
I did search all tickets to see if this has been reported already but appears not to have been.

Comments.Message: Of course you can manually add the item yourself making this even less important. Sorry forgot about that feature.
The neck is in the base item cache. Can you provide a saved file that shows it not listed?

I've reset my item cache to see if that helped and its now showing up (assuming my manually added version is removed on cache reset). Perhaps I just had an out of date cache? Depends when the item was added as its been missing for a while (only just reported it as I finally got hold of the item).

Regardless I think you can close this now.
